result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

chargeModifiers.descr: Domestic Abuse - Infliction of Physical Pain or Injury

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Deshaun Antonio Cowart

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Deshaun Antonio Cowart appeared by video.  Attorney Tedia K. Gamino appeared by video for Deshaun Antonio Cowart.  Attorney John Theodore Chisholm in court for State of Wisconsin. 
Attorney Gamino was just recently appointed to the case and is requesting a status conference.  Case is adjourned to 11-9-22 for status conference by zoom.
This hearing may be streamed live on DAcast at the discretion of the Court:
https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/d84cd54a-763c-3a58-15a9-b84acf306616
Status conference scheduled for November 9, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 5. No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms. Defendant advised if released from custody it is a requirement to attend all future court proceedings.  Failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping, a warrant issued or high cash bail.

Defendant Deshaun Antonio Cowart appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Amanda Poznanski appeared by video for Deshaun Antonio Cowart.  Attorney Karine O'Byrne appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Havas, Branch 10.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant plead not guilty.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION IF HE REMAINS IN CUSTODY.  NOT INDIGENT IF RELEASED. This hearing may be streamed live on DAcast at the discretion of the Court:  https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/d84cd54a-763c-3a58-15a9-b84acf306616
Pre-trial conference scheduled for October 13, 2022 at 08:30 am.

ADDRESS INFO for Deshaun Antonio Cowart
Current: 8918 N 97th St Apt 104, Milwaukee, WI 53224 United States  (Effective: 09-20-2022)
Prior: 3119 South 95th Street, Milwaukee, WI 53227

Court ordered no contact with KKS (DOB 10/13/89)
No Contact/No Weapons Order, signed and filed.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
